story:
Let me turn this resume into a story about this professional's career journey:

For over 19 years, this dedicated advertising professional has carved out an impressive path in newspaper sales, evolving with the industry from print to digital media. Their journey began in 1995 as a Classified Private Party Representative, where they cut their teeth in basic sales calls and learned the fundamentals of the newspaper industry.

As they progressed through the late 1990s, they took on increasingly responsible roles, moving into commercial representation and special occasions. The turn of the millennium marked their first significant recognition, earning Advertising Employee of First Quarter 2000 at The Fayetteville Observer.

The early 2000s saw them diversifying their expertise, handling everything from wedding announcements to obituaries, while building crucial customer service skills. By 2005, they had transitioned to recruitment advertising at The Savannah Morning News, where their excellence was recognized with a Salesperson of the Month award. This period marked their adaptation to digital integration, as they began working with online platforms like CareerBuilder.com.

2007 brought a shift to automotive multimedia sales, where they developed sophisticated campaign-building skills and mastered online product integration. Their peak achievement came in 2010 when they earned the prestigious Circle of Excellence at The Augusta Chronicle.

Currently serving as a Digital Media Sales Consultant, they've become a cornerstone resource for advertising staff, helping bridge the gap between traditional and digital advertising solutions. Their commitment to professional growth is evident in their pursuit of higher education, having completed a Bachelor's in Psychology and working toward a Master's in Counseling and Clinical Psychology.

Throughout their career, they've consistently invested in skill development, participating in numerous training programs from value-based selling to customer service excellence. Their passion extends beyond the workplace to animal rescue organizations, showing their commitment to community service.

This is the story of someone who didn't just adapt to the evolving media landscape - they helped shape it, building lasting client relationships and consistently delivering results along the way.
